name: @feathersjs/client
description: A module that consolidates Feathers client modules for REST (jQuery, Request, Superagent) and Websocket (Socket.io, Primus) connections
author: Feathers contributors

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist
scripts.browserify:min: browserify lib/client.js -t babelify --standalone feathers | uglifyjs > dist/feathers.min.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:dist && npm run browserify:min && npm run browserify:test
scripts.add-dist: npm run clean && npm run browserify:dist && npm run browserify:min && git add dist/ --force && git commit -am "Updating dist"
scripts.publish: git push origin --tags && npm run changelog && git push origin
scripts.bower: node version && git add bower.json && git commit -am "Update version"
scripts.changelog: github_changelog_generator && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am "Updating changelog"
scripts.release:prerelease: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version prerelease && npm run bower && npm publish --tag pre --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version patch && npm run bower && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version minor && npm run bower && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run reinstall && npm run add-dist && npm version major && npm run bower && npm publish --access public
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run coverage
